channel.title: Player names
channel.description:
Hey, in my client no players are allowed to have characters such as "-", ".", "*", "+", or pretty much any character that isn't a letter or number. I think this is so people don't crash the server. But, is it possible to change it so you can have "-" in your name?
Thanks. 14-08

item.title: Player names
item.description:
@14-08 wrote:

Okay, thanks a lot. I’ll have a look. I really only want one new charcter. (-).

But thank you
14-08[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 19, 2009, 02:28:22 am[/size][hr]I couldn’t find anything in my client files nor in my server files.

If anyone knows, I would really appreciate the help.
14-08

Read full topic

item.title: Player names
item.dc:creator: @Cabby Cabby
item.description:
@Cabby wrote:

Yes, it is possible.

I don’t remember exactly how but there is something in your files that specifically points out those characters so they can not be used.

It can easily be removed once you find it.
Careful what you let your players name themselves though, some can mess up your server!

Read full topic

item.title: Player names
item.description:
@14-08 wrote:

Hey, in my client no players are allowed to have characters such as “-”, “.”, “*”, “+”, or pretty much any character that isn’t a letter or number. I think this is so people don’t crash the server. But, is it possible to change it so you can have “-” in your name?

Thanks.
14-08

Read full topic
